unnormalised: Fyi, tumchi BSES bill online bhortana, convenience fee add asa ki na check karunk visru naka. Kiteak mhonnlear kednaim-kednaim credit card vaprungeleak tea khatir te Rs. 10-20 extra add kortat. Ani PhonePe va Paytm sarkhea apps-ancher cashback offers asa khuim polleiat; tumkam ₹50-₹100 bachounk melltolle! Ani tum mhineache 7 tarihache adim bhortat zalear, zaite provider 2% discount ditat, dekhun tumchem payment poilem korat!
normalised: tumchea mahiti khatir, tumchem B-S-E-S bill online bhorotana, sudhevai shulk (convenience fee) aspaav asa ki na te tpasunk yaad dovrat. kiteak, kednam kednam credit card vapruneka rupiya dha te vis chodd laytaat. tench porim, PhonePe va Paytm sarkhe appancher cashback offeranche lagim diis divat; tumkam rupiya pannaas te ek she tasarunk sakta! ani tumi mahineache saat tareke adim bhorle zalear, zaite purvonkar don takke soddde divtaat, mhunn tumchem bhugtanem adimuch korat!
text: Fyi, tumchi BSES bill online bhortana, convenience fee add asa ki na check karunk visru naka. Kiteak mhonnlear kednaim-kednaim credit card vaprungeleak tea khatir te Rs. 10-20 extra add kortat.
